mapper.insert: insert into bbs values( bbs_bidx.nextval, #{midx}, #{kind}, #{horse}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, #{img}, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select bbs.*, member.nick from bbs join member on bbs.midx=member.midx where kind='공지사항' order by bidx desc
select bbs.*, member.nick from bbs join member on bbs.midx=member.midx where kind='웨딩후기' order by bidx desc
select bbs.*, member.nick from bbs join member on bbs.midx=member.midx where kind='웨딩톡톡' order by bidx desc
select bbs.*, member.nick from bbs join member on bbs.midx=member.midx where bidx=#{bidx}
mapper.insert: insert into reply values( reply_ridx.nextval, #{bidx}, #{nick}, #{id}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update bbs set watch=watch+1 where bidx=#{bidx}
